Package acsse.csc2a.nova.models

Class Comet

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody
acsse.csc2a.nova.models.Comet
All Implemented Interfaces:
acsse.csc2a.nova.models.IUpdateable, AbstractVisitable
public class Comet extends acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody implements AbstractVisitable
Represents a comet, which is a type of celestial body characterized by its radiation attribute.

A Comet extends CelestialBody and includes a unique radiation property. The radiation is typically represented as a lowercase string.

Version:
P05
Author:
Mr. Orfao

  • Constructor Details

    • Comet

      public Comet(String name, int radius, acsse.csc2a.nova.models.EColour colour, acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody parent, String radiation)
      Constructs a Comet with the specified name, radius, colour, parent celestial body, and radiation.

      The name may include square brackets, which are removed by the superclass constructor.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the comet
      radius - the radius of the comet
      colour - the colour of the comet, represented by an EColour
      parent - the parent celestial body of the comet, or null if none exists
      radiation - the radiation attribute of the comet (should be a lowercase string)

  • Method Details

    • validate

      public static boolean validate(String line)
      Validates if the provided line is a Comet representation
      Parameters:
      line - the String representation of the Comet (name, colour, radius, radiation, parent)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the comet.

      The output includes the celestial body's details (name, colour, and radius) followed by the comet's radiation attribute and the parent celestial body's name (or "none" if no parent exists), all separated by TAB characters.

      Overrides:
      toString in class acsse.csc2a.nova.models.CelestialBody
      Returns:
      a TAB-separated string representing the comet

    • getRadiation

      public String getRadiation()
      Retrieves the radiation attribute of the comet.
      Returns:
      the radiation attribute as a String

    • setRadiation

      public void setRadiation(String radiation)
      Sets the radiation attribute of the comet.
      Parameters:
      radiation - the new radiation attribute to set
